channel.title: MSFSX: Acceleration Help
channel.description: Hello, I installed MSFSX onto a portable hard drive a while ago. I have recently gotten Acceleration, and would like to install it, but I cannot figure out how to change the path that it install to with. I tried changing the registry, but it did not work. I also tried copying the files to C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Microsoft Flight Simulator X, but that did not work either. Can anyone help? Thanks Justis EDIT Fixed, for anyone that still needs help, use [url=http://www.flight1software.com/files/FS_Registry_Repair.exe]FSX Registry Repair[/url].

item.title: MSFSX: Acceleration Help
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Hello,
I installed MSFSX onto a portable hard drive a while ago.
I have recently gotten Acceleration, and would like to install it, but I cannot figure out how to change the path that it install to with. I tried changing the registry, but it did not work. I also tried copying the files to C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Microsoft Flight Simulator X, but that did not work either. Can anyone help?
Thanks
Justis
EDIT
Fixed, for anyone that still needs help, use FSX Registry Repair.

Read full topic
